display.name: The location to open the HTML page
Input data series in JSON format
Input event series in JSON format
Save data and event series to a separate file

property.name: description
property.configure: null

property.name: author
property.configure: Baobing (Brian) Wang

property.name: version
property.configure: $Id: DyGraphsJSPlotter.java 28323 2012-07-12 11:32:07Z briankw $

property.name: userLevelDocumentation
property.configure:
Attribute for generating the HTML file with JavaScript to plot simulation results using the Dygraphs library. The HTML file is generated by "Export to Web". An @link IconLink attribute can be customized with the generated file to open the HTML page.

Configure the export parameters by double-clicking on the attribute, then click the "Configure" button).

dataJSON contains the data series to be plotted in the chart area of the page. Two JavaScript array formats are acceptable:

  • [{name:"series 1", value:[[x1, y1], [x2, y2], ..., [xn, yn]]}, {name:"series 2", value:[[x'1, y'1], [x'2, y'2], ..., [x'n, y'n]]}, ...]
  • [{name:"series 1", value:[{x:x1, y:y1}, {x:x2, y:y2}, ..., {x:xn, y:yn}]}, {name:"series 2", value:[{x:x'1, y:y'1}, {x:x'2, y:y'2}, ..., {x:x'n, y:y'n}]}, ...]
eventsJSON contains the event information series to be annotated in the chart area. Only one JavaScript array format is acceptable:
  • [{name:"series 1", value:[{x:x1, y:y1, text:"event 1 info"}, {x:x2, y:y2, text:"event 2 info"}, ...]}, {...}, ...]

property.name: prop:xAxisMode
property.configure: Parameter specifying how to parse the X axis value. This defaults to "linear".

property.name: prop:verticalAlign
property.configure: Parameter specifying the vertical position of the legend on the figure. This defaults to "bottom".

property.name: prop:saveDataToFile
property.configure: Parameter specifying if the data and event traces should be saved in a separated file. This is a boolean that defaults to false.

property.name: prop:autoResize
property.configure: Parameter specifying if the figure should be auto-resized based on the window size. This is a boolean that defaults to true.

property.name: prop:enableEventsMarker
property.configure: Parameter specifying if markers should be drawn for event points. This is a boolean that defaults to true.

property.name: prop:enableLegend
property.configure: Parameter specifying if the legend should be shown on the figure. This a boolean that defaults to true.

property.name: prop:enableDataMarker
property.configure: Parameter specifying if markers should be drawn for data points. This is a boolean that defaults to false.

property.name: prop:yAxisTitle
property.configure: Parameter specifying the title of the Y axis. This defaults to "Y Axis".

property.name: prop:graphWidth
property.configure: Parameter specifying the width of the figure. This is an int that defaults to 400px.

property.name: prop:graphHeight
property.configure: Parameter specifying the height of the figure. This is an int that defaults to 500px.

property.name: prop:eventsMarkerRadius
property.configure: Parameter specifying the radius of markers for event points. This is an int that defaults to 3.

property.name: prop:dataJSON
property.configure: Parameter giving the data traces in JSON format to be plot. This defaults to ""

property.name: prop:yAxisMode
property.configure: Parameter specifying how to parse the Y axis value. This defaults to "linear".

property.name: prop:eventsConnectWidth
property.configure: Parameter specifying the width of the stroke connecting event points This is an int that defaults to 0.

property.name: prop:horizontalAlign
property.configure: Parameter specifying the horizontal position of the legend on the figure. This defaults to "center".

property.name: prop:height
property.configure: Parameter specifying the height of the editing box. This is an int that defaults to 20.

property.name: prop:dataMarkerRadius
property.configure: Parameter specifying the radius of markers for data points. This is an int that defaults to 3.

property.name: prop:linkTarget
property.configure:
Parameter specifying the target for the link. The possibilities are:
  • _lightbox: Open in a lightbox-style popup frame.
  • _blank: Open in a new window or tab.
  • _self: Open in the same frame as it was clicked.
  • _parent: Open in the parent frameset.
  • _top: Open in the full body of the window.
  • framename: Open in a named frame.
The default is "_lightbox".

property.name: prop:width
property.configure: Parameter specifying the width of the editing box. This is an int that defaults to 60.

property.name: prop:dataConnectWidth
property.configure: Parameter specifying the width of the stroke connecting data points This is an int that defaults to 2.

property.name: prop:displayText
property.configure: Parameter giving the text to display in the Ptolemy model. This defaults to "Content for Export to Web".

property.name: prop:eventsJSON
property.configure: Parameter giving the event traces in JSON format to be plot. This defaults to ""

property.name: prop:outputHTMLFile
property.configure: Parameter specifying the name of the generated HTML file. This defaults to "JSPlotter.html".

property.name: prop:drawHorizontalGridLine
property.configure: Parameter specifying if the horizontal grid line should be drawn. This is a boolean that defaults to true.

property.name: prop:xAxisTitle
property.configure: Parameter specifying the title of the X axis. This defaults to "X Axis".

property.name: prop:outputDataFile
property.configure: Parameter specifying the name of the file to store the data and event traces. This defaults to "simulationResult.txt".

property.name: prop:drawVerticalGridLine
property.configure: Parameter specifying if the vertical grid line should be drawn. This is a boolean that defaults to false.
